root.name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare: Mobilized
root.description: IntroductionCall of Duty: Modern Warfare: Mobilized is the DS take on Modern Warfare 2 for PC, PS3 and 360 by Activision. The DS game is developed by n-Space, who also developed the previous two DS entries of the series, Call of Duty 4 and Call of Duty: World At War.FeaturesArcade mode that allows the player to replay mission with a time limit and a scoring system.Survival mode that pits the players against waves of enemies.6 player online multiplayer.Â
